result.execSummary:
The defendant Thomas V Drusch was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Child Pornography [Modifiers: Lifetime Supervision of Serious Sex Offenders], a class D felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.12(1m).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Consecutive to: Consecutive to the sentence in La Crosse Co case 13CF840
.

superMiscConds.notes:
Comply with all rules and conditions of the Sex Offender Registry

Provide a DNA sample and pay the DNA surcharge

Pay the Child Pornagraphy surcharge of $500

Comply with all sex offender rules

Pay Crime Lab and Drug Assessment fee (see 'other' above for amount)

Pay DOC Supervision fees

If Extended Supervision is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of resititution victims and/or govermental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt

supervisions.notes:
After completion of Extended Supervision, the defendant will remain on lifetime sex offender registration pursuant to WI.STATS.939.615
.

chargeModifiers.descr: Lifetime Supervision of Serious Sex Offenders

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Thomas V Drusch

records.addlTxt:
State by Hynek & Maas from DOJ / Def in custody w/ Atty Christopher Zachar
Prelim Hrg Quest & Waiver filed
Information filed
Neg Plea / Plea Quest & Waiver filed 
Ineligible Voting Notice filed 
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief filed 
Ct 1 - Def pleads GUILTY
CRT finds def's plea is FKVI made - sufficient factual basis exists to support plea & def is found Guilty
Written Explanation of Determinate Sentence filed - copy given to def
CRT'S SENTENCE:  Def sentenced to WSP for total length of sentence of 13 years:
- Initial Term of Confinement is 3 yrs Consecutive to sentence in 13CF840 - def is eligible for CIP & ERP
- Extended Supervision is 10 yrs w/ conditions:  Comply w/ Sex Offender Registry;  Provide DNA sample & pay surcharge;  Pay Child Porn surcharge (these are Waived on the DRI charges);  Comply w/ all sex offender rules - lifetime supervision pursuant to 939.615 WIS.STATS;  Pay CC & DOC fees
